actions.content:
import tkinter as tk
from tkinter import messagebox
from src.quotes_db import QuoteDatabase

class MotivatorApp:
    def __init__(self, root):
        self.db = QuoteDatabase()
        self.root = root
        self.root.title("Daily Motivator")
        self.root.geometry("400x300")
        
        self.setup_ui()

    def setup_ui(self):
        # Main Label
        self.label = tk.Label(self.root, text="Ready to be inspired?", wraplength=350, font=("Helvetica", 14))
        self.label.pack(pady=40)

        # Inspire Button
        self.btn_inspire = tk.Button(self.root, text="Inspire Me!", command=self.show_quote, bg="#4CAF50", fg="white")
        self.btn_inspire.pack(pady=10)

    def show_quote(self):
        quote = self.db.get_random_quote()
        self.label.config(text=quote)
actions.voiceover: We're setting up the main window using Tkinter, including a label for text and a button to trigger the action.
